name: The Rooftop
description: Flat roof of a two-story building, accessed by external stairs. Partially enclosed by a low wall. Wide view of surrounding territory. A place for watching.
lighting_quality: Elevated and clear. First to catch sunrise, last to lose sunset. Moon closer.
temperature_range: Wind-cooled during day, cold at night. No stored heat.
acoustic_quality: Sound from below drifts up. Wind constant. Feeling of being above it all.
atmosphere: Solitary and observational. A space for distance and perspective.
